msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).

condition.ab: Broken off on the right (and on the left of col. 176); columns 178-181 are missing

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Karanos son of Orsenouphis and Tapetsiris grandson of Imouthes (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Petermouthis son of Kastor and Tasoucharion grandson of Heraklas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Pakysis son of Phanomgeus and Tepheros grandson of Pakysis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Sarapion son of Heras presbyteros and Thermouthis grandson of Herakles (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Ptolemaios son of Nestosiris and Thermouthis grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 218)
Ammonis son of Harpagathes and Segathis grandson of Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 151)
Panesneus son of Ischyras and Thaesis grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 197)
Ischyras son of Panesneus and Tamystha grandson of Ischyra and Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 179)
Mystharion son of Petheus and Thaesis grandson of Esouris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 188)
Horos son of Horos and Taarmothes (Taharmothes) grandson of Horos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Ptolemaios son of Phaesis and Tanais grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Neilos son of Euemeros and Sambous grandson of Neilos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 190)
Petheus son of Pakysis and Tamaron grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Charidemos son of Petoraipis and [Thaesis] grandson of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Onnophris son of Aunes and Thaisas grandson of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Ninis son of Asklas and Tabous grandson of Ninis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Sempronius son of Ptolemaios and Nilous grandson of Ptolemaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 228)
Gaius Iulius Longus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159)
Gaius son of Telekeitis (Telekitis) (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 160)
Kames son of Petheus and Tkonnos grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Sisois son of Onnophris and Tapetheus grandson of Akousilaos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Horos son of Petaus and Tauris grandson of Petaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Hareotes son of Phaesis and Tanais grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Sabinus son of Anchophis and Thases grandson of Herakles (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: (Col.) 177;;On the 8th (of Thoth?), similarly:;Karanos, son of Orsenouphis and Tapetsiris, grandson of Imouthes: [- - -];Petermouthis, son of Kastor and Tasoucharion, grandson of Heraklas, [for ch(--): - - -];Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus and Tepheros, grandson of Pakysis, [for ch(--): 4 drachmai];Sarapion, son of Heras the elder and Thermouthis, grandson of Herakles, [for ch(--): - - -];Ptolemaios, son of Nestosiris and Thermouthis, grandson of Petheus: [- - -];Ammonis, son of Harpagathes and Segathis, grandson of Heras: [- - -];Panesneus, son of Ischyras and Thaesis, grandson of Petheus, [for ch(--): - - -];Ischyras, his son, his mother being Tamystha: [- - -];Mystharion, son of Petheus and Thaesis, grandson of Esouris, [for ch(--): - - -];Horos, son of Horos and Taarmothes, grandson of Horos, [for ch(--): - - -];Ptolemaios, son of Phaesis and Tanais, grandson of Petheus: [- - -];Neilos, son of Euemeros and Sambous, grandson of Neilos: [- - -];Petheus, son of Pakysis and Tamaron, grandson of Petheus, [for ch(--): - - -];Charidemos, son of Petoraipis and [Thaesis], grandson of Onnophris, [for ch(--): - - -];Onnophris, son of Aunes and Thaisas, grandson of Onnophris: [- - -];Total for the day: 84 drachmai 19 obols.;;On the 9th, similarly:;Ninis, son of Asklas and Tabous, grandson of Ninis, [for ch(--): - - -];Sempronius, son of Ptolemaios and Nilous, grandson of Ptolemaios: [- - -];Gaius Iulius Longus - (through) Gaius, son of Telekeitis - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 21 drachmai 4 1/2 obols; for olive (transportation), 3 drachmai 1/2 obol; for naubion, 2 drachmai 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for supplements, [5 drachmai 3 obols]; for eparourion, 14 drachmai 3 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 5 obols. [Total: 49 drachmai1/2 obol].;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements: 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos: 2 chalkoi. [Total: 1 drachme 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi]. (In left margin:) 48 drachmai 23 obols.);Kames, son of Petheus and Tkonnos, grandson of Petheus: [- - -];Sisois, son of Onnophris and Tapetheus, grandson of Akousilaos, [for ch(--): - - -];Horos, son of Petaus and Tauris, grandson of Petaus, [for ch(--): - - -];Hareotes, son of Phaesis and Tanais, grandson of Petheus: [- - -];Sabinus, son of Anchophis and Thases, grandson of Heraklas: [- - -];[Total] for the day: 104 drachmai [. .] obols

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC - Pearl OM, PMich IV/2, 358E, col. 177, 1939
